metadata.title: CVE-2017-0901 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
RubyGems version 2.6.12 and earlier fails to validate specification names,allowing a maliciously crafted gem to potentially overwrite any file on thefilesystem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0901` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.3 - 2.3.1-2~16.04.6
ruby2.3 - 2.3.1-2~16.04.6
ruby2.3-tcltk - 2.3.1-2~16.04.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-2~16.04.6').
jruby package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
